Title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
Actors: JoBeth Williams, Craig T. Nelson, Heather O'Rourke, Oliver Robins
Plot: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
Production: Freddie Fields Productions, Metro Goldwyn Mayer
